h2_title: All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations
h3_title: Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 4 Location
content: Head back to the Shrine once again and take the path through the centre of Squall Hideout. You will spot the Buddha's Eyeball statue along it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Eyeball_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Eyeball Locations', specifically from the subsection 'All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 4 Location'.
The content is as follows:
Head back to the Shrine once again and take the path through the centre of Squall Hideout. You will spot the Buddha's Eyeball statue along it.
